titleStmt.title: A delicate new ditty composed upon the posie of a ring: being, I fancie none but thee alone sent as a new-years gift by a lover to his sweet-heart. To the tune of Dulcina.

publicationStmt.publisher: [by A. Matthewes?] for H. Gosson on London Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Suggested printer's name and estimated publication date from STC.
Verse - "Thou that art so sweet a creature,".
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
